topic.title: Web Application Proxy
topic.shortdesc: The latest version of Web Application Proxy focuses on new features that enable publishing and pre-authentication for more applications and improved user experience. Check out the full list of new features that includes pre-authentication for rich client apps such as Exchange ActiveSync and wildcard domains for easier publishing of SharePoint apps. For more information, see Web Application Proxy in Windows Server 2016../remote/remote-access/web-application-proxy/web-application-proxy-windows-server.md.
